comment: Easily one of my favorite professors. I loved the fact that he genuinely cared about teaching us and he did so much for us like bringing in special guests to speak. Very funny. Very sarcastic. No tests/quizzes. Just participate, do the assignments and youll get an A.

THIS IS THE PROFESSOR TO TAKE... not because you think it will be easy but because this is the coolest professor who gives you a better understanding of the sports broadcasting field and what tools you will need to get started and succeed. listen to his advice, complete your podcasts, and participate in class and you will do great!

I cannot say enough quality things about Jeff Benedict. If you invest in his class, he will invest in you. I am two years removed from his class and he is still a close reference and contact of mine. Do the podcasts. Go to class. Participate. The more you give in this class, the more you'll get. Also, the dude is hilarious. Warning: Heavy Sarcasm
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: JUST GO TO CLASS AND DO THE PODCASTS. Honestly the best teacher I've had so far. Knows his subject because he still does it as a job and his advice is amazing for the future.
Jeff has been my favorite teacher so far at KSU. You have a few podcasts to do and a few events to attend, but it's beneficial for you and the class. I would recommend taking his broadcasting class.
